articles.title: Quiet Skies Program: Political Beneficiary or Aviation Security Asset?
articles.description: The Trump administration has terminated the TSA's 'Quiet Skies' watch list program, citing its misuse for political gain. The decision has sparked debate about balancing aviation security and civil liberties.
